meanings.definition: relating to the arrangement of atoms in a molecule
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the conformational changes in the molecule.
meanings.sent2: Chemists use advanced techniques to analyze conformational structures.
meanings.sent3: The conformational dance of atoms in the molecule was like a well-choreographed ballet.
meanings.sent4: The conformational puzzle of the molecule's structure finally clicked into place.
meanings.sent5: The conformational arrangement of atoms resembled a complex jigsaw puzzle.
